term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - programmed-pressure chromatography (pressure programming)
term.title: programmed-pressure chromatography

item.text: A procedure in which the inlet pressure of the mobile phase is changed systematically during a part or whole of the separation.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 827 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
